definitions.definition: to do something that involves risks that might result in loss of money or failure, hoping to get money or achieve success:
examples: Anyone who gambles on the stock exchange has to be prepared to lose money.

definitions.definition: to risk money, for example in a game or on a horse race:
examples: I like to gamble when I play cards - it makes it more interesting.

definitions.definition: a risk that might result in loss of money or failure:
examples: Her publishers knew they were taking a gamble when they agreed to publish such an unusual novel.
